name: exurban
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a region beyond the suburbs (= the areas built around cities) where not many houses are built and where rich people often live: an exurban community He did extremely well among exurban voters. See
exurb
More examplesFewer examplesExurban areas have grown fast and are full of young families.Walton made his fortune by selling goods at low prices in downscale rural and exurban communities. The Forest Service advises exurban landowners to reduce their fire danger by pruning low branches near their homes.
